description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called 'BaseScaffold' that provides a responsive layout with a top app bar and navigation menus, either as a side drawer or bottom navigation, depending on screen width. It includes classes for building the layout components, such as '_TopBar', '_SideNav', and '_BottomNav', and a navigation item class '_NavItem'. The file uses Flutter Material components and Provider for state management.

classes.name: BaseScaffold
classes.description: A responsive scaffold widget with top bar, side navigation for wide screens, and bottom navigation for narrow screens.

classes.name: _TopBar
classes.description: A widget representing the top app bar with status icons and a popup menu.

classes.name: _SideNav
classes.description: A widget representing the side navigation panel with a list of navigation items.

classes.name: _BottomNav
classes.description: A widget for bottom navigation bar with navigation destinations.

classes.name: _NavItem
classes.description: A simple data class representing a navigation item with label, icon, and path.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the 'BaseScaffold', arranging the app bar, navigation, and body content.

methods.name: _navItems
methods.description: Returns a list of navigation items used in the scaffold's navigation menus.
